title: Death curse
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

**Death curses** fall on any creature who kills a [guardian mummy](/Guardian_mummy "Guardian mummy"), [mummy priest](/Mummy_priest "Mummy priest"), [royal mummy](/Royal_mummy "Royal mummy"), or [Khufu](/Khufu "Khufu"). This does not apply to killing mummies that have been summoned in any way; only "naturally" occurring mummies have death curses.

The severity of the curse depends on the [HD](/HD "HD") of the mummy. Followers of [Kikubaaqudgha](/Kikubaaqudgha "Kikubaaqudgha") with enough [piety](/Piety "Piety") are resistant to these curses - half of all curses are negated, and the severity of the remainder are halved.

No death curse is applied if a mummy is banished to the [Abyss](/Abyss "Abyss"), slimified by [Jiyva](/Jiyva "Jiyva"), kills itself while [confused](/Confused "Confused"), falls down a [shaft](/Shaft "Shaft"), or is killed by [confused](/Confusion "Confusion") or a [frenzied](/Frenzy "Frenzy") enemy. However, allowing an allied creature to kill a mummy still results in you suffering the death curse.

Death curses can also be caused by Kikubaaqudgha's wrath (in which case the severity is the player's XL) and the [Scythe of Curses](/Scythe_of_Curses "Scythe of Curses") (in which case the severity is the melee damage of that strike).

## Contents

- [1 Curse Selection](#Curse_Selection)
- [2 Flavour](#Flavour)
- [3 Pain](#Pain)
- [4 Slowing](#Slowing)
- [5 Draining](#Draining)
- [6 Torment](#Torment)
- [7 History](#History)

## Curse Selection

|                    | Curse Effects |       |       |       |         | Severity |
| ------------------ | ------------- | ----- | ----- | ----- | ------- | -------- |
|                    | Flavour       | Pain  | Slow  | Drain | Torment |          |
| **Guardian Mummy** | 42.9%         | 29.6% | 9.2%  | 9.2%  | 9.2%    | 7        |
| **Mummy Priest**   | 26.5%         | 33.7% | 13.3% | 13.3% | 13.3%   | 10       |
| **Royal Mummy**    | 0%            | 40%   | 20%   | 20%   | 20%     | 15       |
| **Khufu**          | 0%            | 28%   | 24%   | 24%   | 24%     | 18       |

## Flavour

Flavour curses have no effect.

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | "Nothing happens." "You smell decay." "You hear strange and distant voices." "You feel homesick." "Your skin prickles." "Pain shoots through your body." "Your bones ache." "The world around you seems to dim momentarily." "Strange energies run through your body." "You shiver with cold." "You sense a malignant aura." "You feel very uncomfortable." "Your bandages flutter." "\[The killer] seems to dim momentarily." "\[The killer] glows \[colour] for a moment." "\[The killer] shivers with cold." "\[The killer] scowls horribly." |

## Pain

If the killer is immune to [torment](/Torment "Torment"), no effect. Otherwise, 5 to `5 + 2 × [severity]` points of irresistible damage.

|   |                                                                                                                                                          |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | "Pain shoots through your body!" "\[The killer] convulses with pain!" "You feel weird for a moment." "\[The killer] has an odd expression for a moment." |

## Slowing

The killer is [slowed](/Slow "Slow") for \[severity] turns.

|   |                                                                           |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | "You feel horribly lethargic." "\[The killer] looks incredibly listless." |

## Draining

The killer suffers [draining](/Draining "Draining") proportional to the \[severity]. [Negative energy resistance](/Negative_energy_resistance "Negative energy resistance") will reduce this by 50% at rN+, 75% at rN++, and 100% at rN+++.

If the killer is the player, there is a \[severity] in 27 chance of suffering 1 to `1 + [severity]/3` points of temporary stat loss instead.

|   |                                                                                        |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | "You are engulfed in negative energy!" "\[The killer] is engulfed in negative energy!" |

## Torment

The killer's current HP is halved. Any form of [torment](/Torment "Torment") resistance can apply to this. Unlike most sources of torment, this is not a full-LOS effect.

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | "Your body is wracked with pain!" "You feel a surge of unholy energy." "\[The killer] convulses!" "Something just walked over your grave. No, really!" "\[The killer] seems frightened for a moment." |

## History

- Prior to [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), death curses were based on necromancy miscast effects, and could cause rotting and summon hostile demons and shadows.
- Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), normal mummies and Menkaure had a death curse that could [curse](/Curse "Curse") your equipment.
- Prior to [0.15](/0.15 "0.15"), allowing an allied or enslaved creature to kill a mummy would force them to suffer the death curse.
- Prior to [0.8](/0.8 "0.8"), item curses could affect [potions](/Potion "Potion"), turning them into [potions of degeneration](/Potion_of_degeneration "Potion of degeneration").
